reportedIssues.title: Multi-Client Instruction Verification Failure (visibility/search)
reportedIssues.notes: Search visibility now consistent across two clients after schema enum correction (audience) and loader synchronization checks.

reportedIssues.title: CRUD Operation Inconsistency (add skip vs get not found / phantom list entries)
